data.text: Moreover the Lord said unto me, Take thee a great roll, and write in it with a manâ€™s pen concerning Maher-shalal-hash-baz.
And I took unto me faithful witnesses to record, Uriah the priest, and Zechariah the son of Jeberechiah.
And I went unto the prophetess; and she conceived, and bare a son. Then said the Lord to me, Call his name Maher-shalal-hash-baz.
For before the child shall have knowledge to cry, My father, and my mother, the riches of Damascus and the spoil of Samaria shall be taken away before the king of Assyria.
The Lord spake also unto me again, saying,
Forsomuch as this people refuseth the waters of Shiloah that go softly,
Now therefore behold, the Lord bringeth up upon them
And he shall pass through Judah;
Associate yourselves, O ye people, and ye shall be broken in pieces;
Take counsel together, and it shall come to nought;
For the Lord spake thus to me with a strong hand,
Say ye not, A confederacy,
Sanctify the Lord of hosts himself;
And he shall be for a sanctuary;
And many among them shall stumble, and fall, and be broken,
Bind up the testimony, seal the law among my disciples.
And I will wait upon the Lord,
Behold, I and the children whom the Lord hath given me
And when they shall say unto you, Seek unto them that have familiar spirits,
To the law and to the testimony:
And they shall pass through it, hardly bestead and hungry:
And they shall look unto the earth;
